execution_plan.description: Retrieve orders from the US that used a coupon by joining orders to customers in the sales_us database and filtering customers in country = 'US' and orders with a non-empty coupon_code.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.customer_id, o.total_eur, o.updated_at, o.coupon_code, c.full_name, c.email, c.country
FROM orders o
INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id
WHERE o.coupon_code IS NOT NULL AND o.coupon_code <> ''
  AND c.country = 'US';
